author: 0xblacktemplar
content: Anyone here participated recently in the KCG ceremony? I just did and it is taking quite long to finish. I am currently seeing the "YOU HAVE BEEN CALLED UPON NOW" page already over 15 minutes and it is using 400% CPU (4 out of my 8 cores). I think I have a fairly good machine so I am wondering why it is taking so long for me despite the FAQ saying it should take no more than 3 minutes?

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: still running lol, still using consistenly 400% CPU, is there a timeout when the sequencer aborts the contribution?

author: pietjepuk
content: You have 1 minute iirc, maybe 2. Then the sequencer moves on to the next

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: hmmm... ok interesting, it didn't report an error or anything and is still using 400% CPU (after almost 2 hours haha)

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: is there a known issue with the Brave browser?

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: interesting, I just retried with Firefox and it worked flawless there `Contribution took 16416.26 milliseconds` I didn't get to this log line with Brave ...

author: satyajitsato
content: It took me a while today but it was done within an hour. On Chrome.

author: trent_vanepps
content: we're seeing this from another participant - did you happen to inspect logs while this was happening? or if you try it again, can you send the logs?

author: 0xblacktemplar
content: Yes I inspected the logs, but I closed the window now, so it basically there were two log lines, one said that 8 cores were detected or something like this and the second log line said that the contribution started or something like this. But then nothing more. When I redid it in Firefox I got as next log line `Contribution took 16416.26 milliseconds` which I never got in Brave.
